author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add the testing code for partial wafer positioning for V17 HGCal Geometry as done in #38345 (now closed)

#### PR validation:

Use cfg's in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx315ZC Add the testing code for partial wafer positioning for V17 HGCal Geometry as done in #38345 (now closed)
